'''The J.R.R. Tolkien Desk Calendar 1980''' was published by [[Ballantine Books]] with illustrations by the [[Brothers Hildebrandt]]

* ISBN 0-345-28534-4-695
* Dimensions: 9 x 8.5 inches
* White plastic comb-bound
